spatial_accuracy.notes: Major plan-to-model deviations. (1) Room placement: overall zoning is roughly similar (living/dining left, bedrooms right, wet areas central), but the entry sequence and internal circulation are substantially altered (E2/E5). (2) Wall alignment: multiple interior walls do not follow the 2D plan; several walls are curved/rounded where the plan is rectilinear (E2/E5). (3) Doors: the main entry door is not clearly present; several internal door positions and swings do not match the plan’s hallway-to-rooms placements (E2/E3). (4) Windows: balcony opening/door is not represented; window counts/locations on exterior walls differ from the plan (E1/E2). (5) Proportions: lounge/dining and corridor proportions appear distorted relative to the labeled dimensions; bedroom and wet-area sizing/spacing is inconsistent with the plan (E4).

structural_fidelity.notes: Structural correspondence is weak. Wall thickness looks mostly consistent visually, but the plan’s adjacency relationships are altered by the curved hall partitions and shifted openings (E2/E5). The plan indicates a separate Bath and separate WC; the 3D appears to change wet-area partitioning/fixture placement and/or merges functions inconsistently (E2/E1). Missing elements include the balcony and the entry/linen definition (E1). No clear additional full rooms are added, but several non-plan partitions/features are introduced (hallucinated geometry) (E5).

furniture_mapping.notes: The 2D plan provides limited furniture, but expected functional fixtures/placements are not mapped faithfully: bathroom/WC fixture layout differs (E2), and extra/altered fixtures or cabinetry elements appear (E5). Scale reads plausible, but correspondence to plan is low.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Visually clean and readable with decent lighting and materials. However, the camera is more perspective than strict isometric/orthographic (minor distortion) (E6). Geometry quality is generally clean, but the introduced curved partitions create a mismatch with the rectilinear source (conceptual artifact vs. plan) (E5). Composition is clear; garage render is neat.

detected_errors.description: Balcony shown on the 2D plan (off the lounge) is missing/not modeled in the 3D render.
Entry and linen/closet area at the bottom-left of the plan is not clearly represented as a defined space in the 3D model.
Interior wall layout differs from the plan: multiple partitions are shifted, changing the hallway/circulation geometry and room boundaries.
Curved/rounded hall partitions are introduced in the 3D render, whereas the 2D plan is rectilinear (hallucinated geometry).
Bath/WC partitioning and fixture placement do not match the plan’s separate Bath and separate WC arrangement.
Door locations between hall and adjacent rooms (bedrooms/bath/WC) appear shifted from the plan’s openings.
Several door swing/orientation indications do not match the 2D plan (inferred from differing door leaf positions and curved foyer layout).
Balcony-side opening (likely a door or large opening from lounge to balcony) is not present as depicted in the 3D.
Exterior window placements/counts differ from the plan (notably in lounge/bedroom facades).
Room and corridor proportions appear inconsistent with the plan’s labeled dimensions (living/dining zone and central circulation sizing).
Detached garage positioning/spacing relative to the dwelling appears inconsistent with the plan’s site relationship (render places it very close/aligned differently).
Render uses perspective rather than strict isometric/orthographic projection, causing mild visual distortion vs. plan reading.
